shows.title: Angelic Voices / UFOs & Strange Phenomena
shows.first_half: In the first half, guest host Ryan Wrecker (email) welcomes Dr. Joan Hangarter, known as Joan of Angels, to discuss how we can tune in to ourselves and hear the voices of the angelic and spirit realms. She'll explore how reconnecting with this inner wisdom can bring clarity, healing, and confidence. In the second half, paranormal investigation consultant Brandon Scott will share his experiences chasing UFOs and other bizarre phenomena.
shows.second_half: 6-10pm PT: Art Bell—Somewhere In Time returns to 2/16/96, when Dr. Nick Begich spoke about Project HAARP and related topics.

shows.title: Psychedelic Entities / The Aetherius Society
shows.guests: David Jay Brown, Sara Phinn Huntley, Paul Nugent
shows.first_half: First Half: Host George Knapp speaks with former neuroscience researcher David Jay Brown and visionary artist and writer Sara Phinn Huntley about their new book The Illustrated Field Guide to DMT Entities, which explores strange beings that appear to people during psychedelic experiences.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Director of The Aetherius Society Paul Nugent will discuss his recent book Maya Mire: A Spiritual Journey into Cosmic Truth and the Dawning of a New World. This fascinating account describes Nugent's personal journey into one of the world's oldest UFO organizations.

shows.title: Living Off the Grid / Paranormal Tour Destinations
shows.guests: Marty Raney, Maria Schmidt, Dacre Stoker
shows.first_half: First Half: Author, TV host, and keynote speaker Marty Raney will discuss living off the grid and how to simplify life. He'll also dive into the origins of homesteading, from the Homestead Act signed into action by Abraham Lincoln to present-day homesteaders who are leaving the city in search of a simpler life along the backroads of rural America.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Maria Schmidt, a former nurse and paranormal researcher, will discuss her organized tours that blend history, culture, and supernatural intrigue. She'll be joined by Dacre Stoker, the great grandnephew of Bram Stoker.

shows.title: Natural Remedies / Ghostly Encounters
shows.first_half: First Half: Dr. Randi Shannon is a naturopathic doctor who will discuss the many ways we can use natural remedies to treat specific ailments and general health issues alongside modern medicine. She'll explain how natural supplements are essential when it comes to everyday health.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author Leslie Rule will present her research on haunted places, apparitions, and the real-life tragic events that resulted from hauntings. She'll also discuss the distinct patterns that she notes in her reports when researching ghostly encounters.

shows.title: The Student Loan Crisis / Soul Healing & NDEs
shows.first_half: First Half: Alan Michael Collinge, the founder of StudentLoanJustice.org, will discuss how on August 1, 2025 federal student loan interest will resume accruing for those on the Biden-era SAVE plan. He'll also explain the state of student loan debt in general.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Crystal Miller, a clinical hypnotherapist, will share the near-death experience that reshaped her understanding of life, consciousness, and the limitless capacity of the human soul to heal. Miller flatlined for 53 minutes after a rare obstetric emergency, which catapulted her into a lifelong journey of exploration.

shows.title: Total Stress Load / GMO Mosquitoes
shows.first_half: First Half: Med-tech company co-founder and healthy product specialist Doug Mulhall will discuss how millions of people are falling ill due to the mysterious effects of Total Stress Load. He'll also present information on what's being done to prevent and reverse Total Stress Load and its threat to human health.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Coast to Coast's investigative reporter Cheryll Jones will share her interview with environmental activist Barry Wray about genetically modified mosquitoes.

shows.title: Hidden Dark Forces / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Author and spiritual guide Kaedrich Olsen will present his work and research on the hidden negative forces that influence our world. He'll dive into everything from spirits that cling to the living, to human-made demons, to ancient archonic beings that manipulate our thoughts, emotions, and even global events. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half. Give George a call and discuss whatever's on your mind!
